com.here.msdkui.routing

Class RouteUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.msdkui.routing.RouteUtil

  • public final class RouteUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class facilitating access to various Route attributes.

    • Method Detail

      • getLongestRoadSegments

        public static java.lang.String getLongestRoadSegments(com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route route)
        Gets the longest road segments of the associated Route.
        Parameters:
        route - a Route instance.
        Returns:
        a string containing the longest road segments or an empty string if the route contains no RoadElement.

      • getTrafficDelayed

        public static android.text.Spannable getTrafficDelayed(android.content.Context context,
                                                       com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route route)
        Gets the traffic delay text of the associated Route.
        Parameters:
        context - the required Context.
        route - a Route instance.
        Returns:
        the Spannable containing the traffic delay.

      • getArrivalTime

        public static java.lang.String getArrivalTime(android.content.Context context,
                                              com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route route,
                                              boolean isTraffic)
        Gets the arrival time of the associated Route with or without traffic.
        Parameters:
        context - the required Context.
        route - a Route instance.
        isTraffic - true if traffic situation should be included, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        a string containing the arrival time.

      • getRouteLength

        public static java.lang.String getRouteLength(android.content.Context context,
                                              com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route route)
        Gets the total length of the associated Route as formatted string.
        Parameters:
        context - the required Context.
        route - a Route instance.
        Returns:
        the formatted route length including units.

      • getDetails

        public static android.text.Spannable getDetails(android.content.Context context,
                                                com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route route)
        Gets different details of the associated Route like via and others.
        Parameters:
        context - the required Context.
        route - a Route instance.
        Returns:
        a Spannable containing the details.

      • getTimeToArrive

        public static android.text.Spannable getTimeToArrive(android.content.Context context,
                                                     com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route route,
                                                     boolean isTraffic)
        Gets the estimated remaining time to arrive at the destination with or without traffic.
        Parameters:
        context - the required Context.
        route - a Route instance.
        isTraffic - true if traffic situation should be included, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        the Spannable containing the remaining time to arrive in the format: days-hours-minutes.

      • getIcon

        public static java.lang.Integer getIcon(com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route route)
        Gets the RouteOptions.TransportMode icon of the associated Route.
        Parameters:
        route - a Route instance.
        Returns:
        an icon indicating the transport mode.

      • getSectionBar

        public static java.util.List<SectionModel> getSectionBar(android.content.Context context,
                                                         com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route route)
        Gets a list of SectionModel elements of the associated Route.
        Parameters:
        context - the required Context.
        route - a Route instance.
        Returns:
        a list containing the SectionModel elements.
